about_the_game:
· Thanks to DSG for authorizing this work

· Thanks to colleagues who have worked hard together

· Thanks to everyone who has always supported my creation

· Without you, there would be no birth of this sequel. Thank you again...

"This is a non-natural world, although everything that happens seems so familiar..."

"Everyone is deeply trapped in it: some are lost and busy; some are addicted to it; some are demented and crazy..."

"If you were the protagonist, how would you solve the puzzles and dig out the truth behind all this?"

"LunarMirror:MoonNightWithoutLight" is the sequel to "LunarMirror" and also the final work of this series. This work has changed the protagonist and connected the story of the spin-off "LunarMirror:The Pavilion of Desire" with the main story "LunarMirror", and the complete process of the story is unfolded from this perspective. This work tells the story of a young female teacher who enters a remote archaeological school to find her missing father. During her time at school, many incredible events happened, and the female teacher began to understand that her father's disappearance was not accidental...

As the truth deepens, disasters around her also follow one after another - Is this the price?

Seemingly group cohesion, but actually each for his own desire - Is this the faith?

Even if the mastermind is severely punished, how can the lost be recovered? - Is this the fate?

The game takes place in the world view of Mirror of the Moon, and players will enter a dangerous school as a female teacher, investigate the truth and rewrite the ending as much as possible while ensuring their own safety.

· This game has a rationality attribute. Please try to avoid foreseeable exciting events. Low rationality may see incredible content, or even end the game.

· This game has multiple interactions and options, and there are hidden contents. Specific options affect the character's favorability and even change the direction of events.

· This game has a lot of collection content. Please pay attention to the relationship, influence, and subsequent development between different elements to avoid missing.

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains unconventional expressions such as horror, curses, and coarse language. Occasionally, it may also include nudity or sexual content that might not be suitable for all audiences.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 / AMD FX-4350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 2GB / AMD Radeon RX 470 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Using only the integrated graphics may cause game crashes

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: This's a distinctive puzzle adventure. A young teacher enters a remote archaeological school in the mountains to search for her missing father. During her time at the school, numerous inexplicable events occur, leading the teacher to realize that her father’s disappearance was not a mere coincidence
supported_languages: English, Japanese, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese
